snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Airbnb trying to help people in places affected by Hurricane Sandy, Marissa Mayer introduces her baby,...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Airbnb trying to help people in places affected by Hurricane Sandy, Marissa Mayer introduces her baby, Macallister, and a robot that may be able to help some people walk again.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Apple Rewrite, and Drones in the U.S.
